alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 11 at 2:25PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros, Mayaguez and San German. * WHEN...Until 430 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 125 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cabo Rojo, Mayaguez, Hormigueros, Lajas, San German, Sabana Grande, Puerto Real, Monte Grande, Boqueron, Pole Ojea, Betances and Sabana Eneas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez; San German
